column5: Hey Big Cliff ... or other OFNers ... I am in the market for another 9.9 (for Quebec) ... tired of driving up to muskoka and back every time I need a motor for the ZEC   I have a personal preference for the old seahorse (workhorse) but aything comparable - and trouble free ....   Mods ... if I need to put this in another area (like WANT-ADS  ... please forgive and go ahead and move ...
